text:
The “Big Bang” of AI is happening.

Here’s what the 2025 data shows:

1. The top 10 AI chatbots now own the web.

From August 2024 to July 2025, the top 10 AI chatbots captured 58.8% of all web traffic. 

The internet is becoming one with AI.

2. ChatGPT is the clear leader.

ChatGPT alone took 48.36% of the entire market.

☑ 46.59 billion annual web visits
☑ 2.4 million annual media citations
☑ 106% year-over-year growth

No other chatbot comes close. 
ChatGPT is the new front door to the internet.

3. The competition is heating up.

Grok, Gemini, and Claude are rising fast.

Each has its unique strengths:

↳ Grok: rapid user growth.
↳ Claude: best at coding/writing.
↳ Gemini: cheap & strong coding.

But none have matched ChatGPT’s reach or influence (yet).

4. The numbers are hard to believe.

✦ 55.88 billion total chatbot visits in 12 months.
✦ 123.35% year-over-year traffic growth.
✦ 7.7 million media citations.

AI chatbots are the new infrastructure of the web

5. This is bigger than the Internet revolution.

AI chatbots are not just another tech wave.

They are more like electricity: an invisible force that will power everything.

At first, electricity seemed like a lightbulb. Then it became the backbone of modern life (and eventually, the internet & AI).

Chatbots are following the same path. 

It’s hard to predict what comes next, but the scale is clear.

PS: I am Ruben, and I write about 'How to AI' with English, not code. I publish a weekly newsletter read by 126,000+ people at how-to-ai.guide.
